meanings.definition: To make or become Arabic in character or style.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant arabises its menu by adding traditional Arabic dishes.
meanings.sent2: She arabises her outfit by wearing a beautiful hijab.
meanings.sent3: The little girl arabises her doll by dressing it in a tiny abaya.
meanings.sent4: His music arabises the room, transporting us to a bustling Middle Eastern market.
meanings.sent5: The artist arabises the painting with intricate Arabic calligraphy.

meanings.definition: To write or transliterate into Arabic script.
meanings.sent1: I arabises my name into Arabic script for my calligraphy project.
meanings.sent2: The translator arabises the document from English to Arabic.
meanings.sent3: The teacher arabises the student's name on the attendance sheet.
meanings.sent4: She arabises the ancient text, preserving its beauty in Arabic script.
meanings.sent5: He arabises the poem, giving it a new life in Arabic characters.
